name: GreenSquid Solutions
description:
GreenSquid Solutions is a web, mobile and software development agency with offices in Canterbury, Kent and Soho, London. We’re growing fast and always on the lookout for exciting projects that will let us experiment with brand new technologies or just put a polished spin on the classics.
We’re generally available to work on new projects more or less immediately but it does depend on the scope of requirements so please get in touch to discuss your ideas if you’d like to see how we can work together. While we aren’t a traditional creative agency we have tons of experience in working with partner solutions providers of all shapes and sizes as well as providing white label development solutions for businesses that need additional support.
READ MORE...
